vsim.riscv

Class MemorySegments

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsim.riscv.MemorySegments

  • public final class MemorySegments
extends java.lang.Object
    The class MemorySegments contains useful memory segment constants. Ref: Chapter 3: RISC-V Assembly Language, The RISC-V Reader +------------------+ | reserved | +------------------+:- 0x7ffffffc SP 0xbffffff0 -:| stack | | | ******************** | | | heap | +------------------+ | static data | GP 0x10000000 -:+------------------+:- 0x10000000 | text | PC 0x00010000 -:+------------------+:- 0x00010000 | reserved | +------------------+:- 0x00000000 |------XLENGTH-----|
